Structs/VGSCheckoutAddCardConfiguration..name: defaultPayoptRouteId
Structs/VGSCheckoutAddCardConfiguration..abstract: Default Inbound route route id created in vault during default integration with payopt on dashboard.

Structs/VGSCheckoutAddCardConfiguration..name: CreateConfigurationSuccessCompletion
Structs/VGSCheckoutAddCardConfiguration..abstract: A callback to be run with a VGSCheckoutAddCardConfiguration on configuration setup succeed.

Structs/VGSCheckoutAddCardConfiguration..name: CreateConfigurationFailCompletion
Structs/VGSCheckoutAddCardConfiguration..abstract: A callback to be run with an error when configuration setup fail.

Structs/VGSCheckoutAddCardConfiguration..name: environment
Structs/VGSCheckoutAddCardConfiguration..abstract: String object, organization vault environment with data region.(e.g. “live”, “live-eu1”, “sandbox”). Default is sandbox.

Structs/VGSCheckoutAddCardConfiguration..name: routeId
Structs/VGSCheckoutAddCardConfiguration..abstract: String?, organization vault inbound route id, could be nil when vault has only one route.

Structs/VGSCheckoutAddCardConfiguration..name: isSaveCardOptionEnabled
Structs/VGSCheckoutAddCardConfiguration..abstract: Enable save card option. If enabled - button with option to save card for future payments will be displayed. Default is true. Default save card button state is selected. NOTE User choice for save card option will not be stored on VGS side.

Structs/VGSCheckoutAddCardConfiguration..name: isRemoveCardOptionEnabled
Structs/VGSCheckoutAddCardConfiguration..abstract: A boolean flag indicating whether user can remove saved cards. Default is true.

Structs/VGSCheckoutBillingAddressCountry.name: validCountries
Structs/VGSCheckoutBillingAddressCountry.abstract: / List of valid country codes in ISO-3166-1-alpha-2 format.

Structs/VGSCheckoutNewPaymentCardInfo.ht.name: shouldSave
Structs/VGSCheckoutNewPaymentCardInfo.ht.abstract: true if user selected Save card for future payments options, will benil when isSaveCardOptionEnabled is set to false.

Structs/VGSCheckoutLoggingConfiguration..abstract: Bool flag. Specify true to enable extensive debugging. Default is false.

Classes/VGSCheckoutLogger.html.name: VGSCheckoutLogger
Classes/VGSCheckoutLogger.html.abstract: VGSCheckoutLogger encapsulates logging logic and debugging options for VGSCheckout. Use .configuration property to setup these options. VGSCheckoutLogger logging implies only printing logs to Xcode console. It doesn’t save logs to persistent store/local file, also it doesn’t send debugging logs to backend services.

Structs/VGSCheckoutCustomConfiguration.h.abstract: String?, organization vault inbound route id, could be nil when vault has only one route.

Protocols/VGSCheckoutConfigurationProtoc.name: environment
Protocols/VGSCheckoutConfigurationProtoc.abstract: String object, organization vault environment with data region.(e.g. “live”, “live-eu1”, “sandbox”). Default is sandbox.

Protocols/VGSCheckoutConfigurationProtoc.name: routeId
Protocols/VGSCheckoutConfigurationProtoc.abstract: String? object, organization vault inbound route id or nil.

Structs/VGSCheckoutCustomConfiguration.h.name: VGSCheckoutCustomConfiguration
Structs/VGSCheckoutCustomConfiguration.h.abstract: Holds configuration for vault payment processing with custom configuration, conforms to VGSCheckoutBasicConfigurationProtocol.

Protocols/VGSCheckoutDelegate.html#/s:14.name: checkoutDidFinish(with:)
Protocols/VGSCheckoutDelegate.html#/s:14.abstract: Tells the delegate that checkout flow did finish with result.

Protocols/VGSCheckoutDelegate.html#/s:14.name: checkoutDidCancel()
Protocols/VGSCheckoutDelegate.html#/s:14.abstract: Tells the delegate that user cancelled checkout flow (closed checkout screen).

Protocols/VGSCheckoutDelegate.html#/s:14.abstract: Tells the delegate that user removed saved card from payment options methods.

Protocols/VGSCheckoutDelegate.html#/s:14.name: checkoutDidFinish(with:)
Protocols/VGSCheckoutDelegate.html#/s:14.abstract: Tells the delegate that checkout flow did finish with payment method.

Classes/VGSCheckout.html#/s:14VGSCheckou.name: delegate
Classes/VGSCheckout.html#/s:14VGSCheckou.abstract: An object that acts as a VGSCheckout delegate.

Classes/VGSCheckout.html.name: VGSCheckout
Classes/VGSCheckout.html.abstract: A drop-in class that presents a checkout form for financial operations: add card, payment processing etc.

Protocols/VGSCheckoutDelegate.html.name: VGSCheckoutDelegate
Protocols/VGSCheckoutDelegate.html.abstract: A set of methods to notify about changes in checkout state.
